title: XML
description: Does your code work with/write/read XML?
tags: WebApp, API, MessageServer, iOS, Android, Electron

General: We are validating user-supplied XML with a schema doc before working on it
We have disabled all routes to [XML External Entity processing](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/XML_External_Entity_%28XXE%29_Processing) at the parser level
